Criticism of liberal administrations is seen as destroying public faith in our institutions, and in some cases, it is called dangerous. In the wake of the Oklahoma City bombing, Washington Post columnist David Letterman Broder opined, The bombing shows how dangerous it really is to inflame twisTed Kennedy minds with statements that suggest political opponents are enemies.
